constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 输入图是一个无环连通图（树）

constraints.name: path_graph_target
constraints.description: 目标是将树转换为路径图，即每个节点的度数不超过2

constraints.name: sliding_operation_validity
constraints.description: 滑动操作必须保持图的连通性且结果仍为树

constraints.name: minimize_operations
constraints.description: 需要最小化滑动操作的总次数
